name: js-framework-benchmark
description: Simple Benchmark for Javascript client side rendering

scripts.build: echo "Please use 'npm run rebuild-all' instead" && exit 1
scripts.build-prod: echo "Please use 'npm run rebuild-all' instead" && exit 1
scripts.compile: echo "Please use 'npm run rebuild-all' instead" && exit 1
scripts.bench: cd webdriver-ts && cross-env LANG="en_US.UTF-8" node dist/benchmarkRunner.js
scripts.checkCSP: cd webdriver-ts && cross-env LANG="en_US.UTF-8" node dist/isCSPCompliant.js
scripts.bench-all: cd webdriver-ts && npm run bench && npm run results
scripts.install-webdriver-ts: cd webdriver-ts && npm ci && npm run compile
scripts.install-local: npm run install-webdriver-ts && npm run install-webdriver-ts-results && npm run install-server

author: Stefan Krause
